the.nss.boys.blog.service

Class ArticleService

  • java.lang.Object
    • the.nss.boys.blog.service.ArticleService

  • @Service
 @CacheConfig(cacheNames="articles")
public class ArticleService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for Articles Adds, Removes, Find and Update articles then persist to database via ArticleDao
